thoughts.text: There are several online PDF to text converters available. I will use the pdftotext.com converter since it was listed first in the search results and has good reviews.
thoughts.reasoning: Using a reliable converter will ensure the accuracy of the text version of the whitepaper.
thoughts.plan:
- Open the pdftotext.com converter
- Upload the whitepaper PDF to the converter
- Download the text version of the whitepaper
- Read the whitepaper
- Take notes on the goals, objectives, and target audience
- Save the notes to a file
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I read the whitepaper thoroughly and take comprehensive notes.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the pdftotext.com converter to convert the whitepaper PDF to text format.

args.question: How to convert PDF to text?
